WorkItem.ClosedComment: This was fixed a while ago
WorkItem.Description:
There is a bug in Site.css that causes an issue with the css around displaying the map in the appropriate location.

On line 339, remove the commas between the 4 padding values:
    padding:0px, 10px, 0px, 10px;     -->    padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;

to get things working right.
Tested with IE 8.
WorkItem.Summary: Bug in Site.css causes problem with the map display
